projects.title: Breakup Space
projects.bio: A service whose mission is to break the dating trend of ghosting by offering templated breakup texts. Users receive these templated texts based on their quiz results. Breakup Space also has a community board so users can share experiences and connect.

projects.title: The Thread
projects.bio: A mobile fashion app providing users the capability to scan their clothing to learn more about what they wear.  Integrated Google Vision API and Expo-Camera to capture and apply optical character recognition for clothing care label reader. Users also receive facts on ethical and sustainable fashion issues along with the ability to save their clothing information and receive graphs of where all their clothing comes from and fiber content using Victory library.

projects.title: Viaggamo
projects.bio: A language learning and translator tool that includes games and lessons to further your language skills. Used Google Translate API for translation capabilities for English, Spanish, French, German, and Italian along with speech recognition and speech synthesis features using the Web Speech API.

projects.title: Scribble
projects.bio: An interactive art app for users to create their own animated art with soothing sounds and fullscreen functionality. Scribble was built as a single-page app using vanilla Javascript. Interactive user animations were achieved by the canvas element and CSS methods.
